name: Chew the bomb
description:
STORY

...I am drifting through space in an emergency escape capsule. Luckily I was able to find an old base station, but what the heck! It was a nest of alien life. Unless I destroy the aliens and get my base back, I can't even call for help. I decided to start cleaning up with Miporus Creature Bombs.

PLAY

You control an astronaut, Astrow. And use a creature bomb, which explodes after a few seconds when thrown, and a laser gun, which is not very powerful, to eliminate all hostile creatures on the stage. The bomb blasts also damage Astrow.  Only when you kill enemies with the bombs, high-scoring energy cubes will appear. After completing 6 stages, the game ends with an ending.

CONTROL

x ... Set the bomb / Throw this bomb
o ... Fire Beam gun
